parameter.name: helperEnabled
parameter.label: Use openHAB Python helper modules
parameter.description:
Deploy and update openHAB Python helper modules like rule, logger, Registry, Timer etc...
If disabled, the openHAB Python helper module can be installed manually by copying it to /conf/automation/python/lib/openhab"

options.option: Install helper modules automatically and keep it updated

parameter.name: cachingEnabled
parameter.label: Cache compiled openHAB Python helper modules (.pyc files)
parameter.description:
Cache the openHAB python modules for improved startup performance.
Disable this option will result in a slower startup performance, because scripts have to be recompiled every.

parameter.name: jythonEmulation
parameter.label: Enable Jython emulation in GraalPy
parameter.description: This enables Jython emulation in GraalPy. It is strongly recommended to update code to GraalPy and Python 3 as the emulation can have performance degradation. For tips and instructions, please refer to Jython Migration Guide.
